concept.title: WHY MOM SAID I CAN'T PLAY WITH THE COMPUTER
concept.shortdesc: MOM NEEDS THE DIAL-UP TO FEED HER ONLINE SHOPPING ADDICTION, NO ONE ELSE CAN USE THE INTERNET *DIAL TONE bEEP bEeP bRRRRRTTTt SCkRRRRhhhH WWWWWW*

conbody.p:
TO UNDERSTAND THE EARLY PARTS OF MY LIFE AND WHY I AM SUBPAR WITH COMPUTERS YOU MUST FIRST UNDERSTAND THE FOLLOWING:
MY FATHER PLAYED TOO MUCH QUAKE
MOMMY TOLD ME EVIL COMPUTER MAN CAN HURT ME
CHRIS HANSEN'S TCAP REALLY MONKEY-WRENCHED MY HOPES OF USING THE COMPUTER BY MYSELF
ALL I WANT IS TO PLAY ROME TOTAL WAR AND AGE OF EMPIRES MOM, PLEEEEASSSEE???
